keyword: calories in a garlic naan bread
title: Calories in a Garlic Naan Bread
meta_description: Discover calories in a garlic naan bread, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks.
h1: Calories in a Garlic Naan Bread
assumptions: Standard restaurant-style garlic naan, ~100g, made with wheat flour, garlic butter topping, baked or tandoor-cooked.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A garlic naan bread typically contains ~350 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a garlic naan bread?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for one standard serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in garlic naan?
faqs.a: Roughly 50 g carbs, including 2 g fiber and 3 g sugars per naan.

faqs.q: Is garlic naan high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~12 g total fat (4 g saturated) mainly from the butter topping.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a garlic naan bread?
faqs.a: Approximately 600 mg, varying by recipe and added salt.

faqs.q: Can I make garlic naan lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for less butter or whole wheat flour to reduce calories by 20-100 kcal.
